external_games.name: Survival Tobita vs. Maniac-Man: Halloween Deathmatch Special!!!

name: Survival Tobita vs. Maniac-Man: Halloween Deathmatch Special!!!
summary: Survival Tobita vs Maniac-Man: Halloween Deathmatch SPECIAL!!! is a simple dungeon crawler JRPG, where you play as Tobita himself! Explore Maniac-Man's deadly factory, fight psycho-wrestlers and try to survive.
